comments.author: The Italian Dish
comments.content: Thanks for the great cookbook review.  I didn't know he had come out with a new one.  I  have the one he wrote at Chez Panisse.  This one sounds great.  I'm going to get it - I'm totally addicted to cookbooks and I love Paul Bertolli.

comments.author: Giff
comments.content: agreed, it is a really interesting cookbook which I have been enjoying as well.  It's almost like a literary project.  If only there were more photos!
